explains: v. 欺骗，哄骗；<旧>迷惑；<旧>逃避；<旧>使失望

sentences.en: We delude ourselves that we are in control.
sentences.cn: 我们欺骗自己一切都在我们的控制之下。

sentences.en: Each one was a girl of fair common sense, and she did not delude herself with any vain conceits, or deny her love.
sentences.cn: 每一个都是明白事理的姑娘，她没有想到为了超过别人，就用虚荣的幻想去自欺欺人，或是去否认她的爱情。

sentences.en: Whatever we do, we should never delude ourselves into believing that gifted children or geniuses are different from the rest of humanity.
sentences.cn: 无论我们怎样做，都不应自欺欺人地相信有天赋的孩子或天才和其他人不同。
